Attacks.Name: Kinesis
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, reduce the target character's defense by 1 for their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Psychic Fury
Attacks.Effect: This attack causes the target character to gain the Confused and Stun special conditions. If a wild is rolled, also apply the Rooted condition, preventing movement during their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Mind Shock
Attacks.Effect: This attack causes the target character to lose 2 power. If a wild is rolled, also deal 1 automatic damage.

Superpowers.Name: Supreme Teleportation
Superpowers.Effect: Place this character anywhere within range 5 of its current position. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Psychic Shield
Superpowers.Effect: Add 3 dice to Mega Alakazam's defense rolls and ignore the first damage from each attack until the start of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Psycho Break
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, choose one enemy character within range 3 of the target. That character gains the Staggered special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Telekinetic Burst
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from Mega Alakazam and gain 3 power. This superpower can be used only once per game.
